name: Basement 5 Checklist
Duct installed, sealed up and levelled
Grilles and OBD’s installed
Volume control dampers installed
Fire dampers installed and tested
Fire penetrations and fire caulking completed
Fire penetrations labelled and documented
Lobby A/C correctly installed
A/C drain installed and tested
Linear grilles installed with foam on boxes to avoid leakage
Builders works completed
Check approved drawings for approved conduit sizes, order correct conduit sizes and components.
Check conduits and components for any damage prior to installation.
Check approved drawings for approved conduit runs and locations
Install required junction boxes at required/approved locations.
Install conduit by securing to metal frame work to avoid conduit sitting on concrete frame work. Ensure there is some distance between the conduits.
Use adhesive that is used for joining PVC conduit. Ensure all joins are sealed correctly.
Where possible check conduits prior to concrete poor to check for any accidental damage by other trades

Ground Floor Checklist
Duct installed, sealed up and levelled
Grilles and OBD’s installed
Volume control dampers installed
Fire dampers installed and tested
Fire penetrations and fire caulking completed
Fire penetrations labelled and documented
All A/C correctly installed
A/C drains installed and tested
Condenser water pipes installed, and pressure tested
Linear grilles installed with foam on boxes to avoid leakage
Fans installed correctly
Fan direction is correct
MSSB installed
Builders works completed
Check approved drawings for approved conduit sizes, order correct conduit sizes and components.
Check conduits and components for any damage prior to installation.
Check approved drawings for approved conduit runs and locations
Install required junction boxes at required/approved locations.
Install conduit by securing to metal frame work to avoid conduit sitting on concrete frame work. Ensure there is some distance between the conduits.
Use adhesive that is used for joining PVC conduit. Ensure all joins are sealed correctly.
Where possible check conduits prior to concrete poor to check for any accidental damage by other trades
